snippet: Shin Bet, Israel’s internal security agency, accused one of the defendants of storing merchandise in his warehouse on the Gaza border and organizing its transfer.
abstract: Three Israelis and six Palestinians are indicted in connection with smuggling ring that provided unauthorized raw materials to Gaza; Israeli authorities say materials were intended to build military infrastructure for Hamas.
lead_paragraph: Shin Bet, Israel’s internal security agency, accused one of the defendants of storing merchandise in his warehouse on the Gaza border and organizing its transfer.

headline.main: 3 Israelis Are Charged on Suspicion of Supplying Materials to Hamas Militants
headline.print_headline: 3 Israelis Are Charged on Suspicion of Supplying Materials to Hamas Militants
